amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for military bases or buildings as venues to house unaccompanied alien children.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in House Report 114-623 to ensure no funds are used by the Department of Defense to carry out or in response to the memorandum of the Deputy Assistant Secretary of Defense for Homeland Defense Integration and Defense Support of Civil Authorities titled Memorandum for Secretaries of the Military Departments Director, Joint Staff and dated November 25, 2015.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A024) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 200 (Roll no. 316).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A024) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 200 (Roll no. 316).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. King (IA).
